mapper.sql: s_label_id, s_lname, s_r_time, s_m_time, w_uid, s_state, filed1, filed2
mapper.select:
select * from dd_label where
s_lname like CONCAT('%', #{s_lname}, '%') and
s_state=1
limit #{num1},#{num2}

select count(0) from dd_label where
s_lname=#{s_lname} and
s_state=1
mapper.insert: insert into dd_label (s_label_id, s_lname, s_r_time, s_m_time, w_uid, s_state, filed1, filed2) values (#{s_label_id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{s_lname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{s_r_time,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{s_m_time,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{w_uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{s_state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{filed1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filed2,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into dd_label
s_label_id,
s_lname,
s_r_time,
s_m_time,
w_uid,
s_state,
filed1,
filed2,
#{s_label_id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{s_lname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update dd_label
s_lname = #{s_lname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
s_r_time = #{s_r_time,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
s_m_time = #{s_m_time,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
w_uid = #{w_uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
s_state = #{s_state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
filed1 = #{filed1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
filed2 = #{filed2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where s_label_id = #{s_label_id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update dd_label set s_lname = #{s_lname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, s_r_time = #{s_r_time,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, s_m_time = #{s_m_time,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, w_uid = #{w_uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, s_state = #{s_state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, filed1 = #{filed1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, filed2 = #{filed2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where s_label_id = #{s_label_id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
